articles.title: Byron 'Reckful' Bernstein dead: Twitch streamer dies aged 31 - Evening Standard
articles.description: Bernstein was a prominent Twitch streamer and huge in the World of Warcraft community
articles.content:
Twitch streamer Byron 'Reckful' Bernstein has died aged 31, according to reports.
The news was confirmed by an ex-girlfriend, with the suspected cause of death being suicide.
